title_sort: louisa van velsor whitman to walt whitman, [23 february 1869]
title: Louisa Van Velsor Whitman to Walt Whitman, [23 February 1869]
text: Brooklynâ€“25 Feb 1868 to attorney general's office wash.my dear Walteri got your letter all safe to day wensdayWednesday it was rather late but it come yesterday was a tremendous rain the water has been a foot deep in the cellar they say the rats has undermined it but it has dried away some itsit's a low place the water settles in the yard it is better george sold it they are much pleased with it say they wouldentwouldn't take 1000 dolsdollars for their bargainmrs Steers gets along very well with her bakery) we have had mrs Black here she has just gone and quite a releifrelief it is too she come she said to tell me of a sure cure for the rheumatis i asked her what it was she said put a potato in each pocket and wear them in your pocket till they are hard and the rheumatis will i supossuppose go in the potatoshe asked me when she went away if i would doodo it i told her i would carry half a dozen if they would do me any goodwell walt i am glad you are bettrbetter of your distress in your head very many people is complaining of colds well the president cantcan't pardon very many more rougesrogues you know i suppose Devlin is pardoned the papers say peirpontPierrepont is to be the attorney genrallgeneral but i suppose you will know soon i hear from Jeff and mat once in a while Jeff has or has had great anxiety about the works the river rises so much higher than usual that there is fear of the overflowing of their works poopoor Jeff i expect he is in lots of trouble but as we understood Davis it wouldentwouldn't doodo such an amount of damage if it did overflow but Jeff is so nervous)walter dear if you can as well as not i wish you would send me the draft next week) George had to make a payment the other day and had to take all he had to make it out) give my love to the oconorsO'Connors and love to yourself)Louisa Whitman Louisa Van Velsor Whitman to Walt Whitman, [23 February 1869]
